original_title: Ally Farson: Confessed Murderess - My Private Life
overview: Part 1  Orange County authorities are looking for a woman who is the first female serial killer reported in the State of California. The woman, going under the name of Ally Farson, is responsible for the known deaths of six people. A seventh person, related by evidence to the crimes, is reportedly missing and presumed dead. The murders took place from June 3rd, 1999 to August 9th, 1999 in Los Angeles. The missing person, whose name has not been released at this time, was last seen on June 3rd, 1999.  A female film student takes her camera and a cameraman on her personal killing spree in Orange County California. Shot (documentary style) you enter the mind of a psychotic girl and her totally dysfunctional family.
title: Ally Farson: Confessed Murderess - My Private Life
